GSD.description:
HID: roccat: Fix use-after-free in roccat_read()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 8a251549ab577d64ece210a11c404354479bd635. For more details please see the references link.
